summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Traffic Code, amending Section 11.14.490 of the Seattle Municipal Code to change the title to "Legal Holidays" and to adopt the definition of legal holidays as contained in Section 1.16.050 of the Revised Code of Washington and to amend Sections 11.72.260, 11.72.300, 11.72.435, and 11.74.020 of the Seattle Municipal Code to delete the words "public" and substitute the word "legal" in reference to holidays.
